message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value and quality, I'm confident it's worth more than your initial assessment. Considering its worth to you, I propose a price of $200 for this exceptional item. This offer reflects not only the product's intrinsic value but also the opportunity it presents for you. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or making a purchase.
